abandonner-cahier-stock.title: Why ditch the notebook for stock management?
abandonner-cahier-stock.excerpt: The notebook has its limits. Discover how going digital can save your business from calculation errors and losses.
abandonner-cahier-stock.content:
Many merchants still use a notebook to record their sales and stock. It's a traditional method, but it carries serious risks.

1. Calculation errors

A simple addition mistake can throw off your entire accounting. With software like Stockman, calculations are automatic and error-free.

2. Data loss

A notebook can be lost, stolen or destroyed by fire. Your data on Stockman is backed up in the cloud and accessible anywhere.

3. No big picture

It's hard to know which product sells best by flipping through pages. Stockman gives you this information in one click.

Conclusion

Going digital is not an expense ‚Äî it's an investment that saves you time and money from the very first month.

eviter-ruptures-fetes.title: How to avoid stockouts during the holidays?
eviter-ruptures-fetes.excerpt: Christmas and Tabaski are critical periods. Prepare your stock in advance with our expert tips.
eviter-ruptures-fetes.content:
Stockouts during the holidays mean a direct loss of revenue. Here's how to avoid them.

Anticipate demand

Use last year's sales history to forecast the quantities you need to order.

Order early

Suppliers are often overwhelmed. Place your orders 2 to 3 weeks earlier than usual.

Use Stockman alerts

Set up alert thresholds to be notified as soon as a product starts running low.

augmenter-marge-2026.title: 3 tips to increase your margin in 2026
augmenter-marge-2026.excerpt: Revenue is good, but margin is better! Learn how to optimize your costs and prices.
augmenter-marge-2026.content:
Raising prices isn't the only way to earn more. Here's how to work on your margin.

1. Reduce losses

Expired or stolen products are costly. Rigorous stock tracking can reduce these losses by 30%.

2. Negotiate with your suppliers

By consolidating your orders through the Stockman Marketplace, you can get better rates.

3. Build customer loyalty

A loyal customer costs less to acquire than a new one. Use the loyalty program to keep them coming back.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.content:
Welcome to Stockman. Protecting your personal data is a priority for us.

1. Data Collection

We collect: identification information (name, email, phone), professional data (store, inventory, transactions), technical data (IP, device, logs).

2. Data Usage

Your data is used exclusively for: managing your stock and sales, securing your account, improving our services and complying with our legal obligations.

3. Storage and Security

Your data is stored on secure servers (MongoDB Atlas) and encrypted at rest. We use the HTTPS protocol for all transfers.

4. Data Sharing

We do not sell or rent your data. It may only be shared with our technical service providers and authorities if required by law.

5. Your Rights (GDPR)

You have the rights of access, rectification, erasure and portability. Exercise these rights from the Settings tab of the app.

6. Contact

For any questions, contact us through the app or at contact@stockman.pro.
